com.anotherservice.rest.core

Class Servlet

  • Object
    • GenericServlet
      • HttpServlet
        • Servlet
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Serializable, Servlet, ServletConfig

    public final class Servlet
extends HttpServlet
    This is the main REST service Servlet. It initializes the ServiceMonitor at start, then it uses the Request, Responder and Router to handle requests.
    Author:
    Simon Uyttendaele
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
    Note:
    Servlet configuration parameters :
    • logLevel : sets Logger.Log.logLevel
    • logStdout : if true, sets Logger.Log.stream to System.out
    • servicesDirectory : sets ServiceMonitor.setDirectory(String)
    • serviceInitializerSection : sets ServiceMonitor.setInitializerSection(String)
    • serviceConfigFileName : sets ServiceMonitor.setConfigFileName(String)

    Important : all servlet configuration parameters are added to the Config under the key "com.anotherservice.rest.core".
    Thus, it may be an apropriate time for setting various REST service parameters for the Router and the Responder.

    • Field Detail

      • tmp

        public static ThreadLocal<HashMap<String,Object>> tmp
        This is a local temporary store location which is valid per request and then cleared. I.e. use it to share info between handlers.
